programs.show_description: Sitting Down With the Newsoms - Emily meets California's First Couple, Gavin and Jennifer Siebel Newsom. The governor is widely considered the frontrunner for the next Democratic nomination.
Mishal Husain, one of Britain's best interviewers, brings her signature blend of curiosity and tenacity to weekly conversations with world leaders, business titans and cultural icons.
Mishal Husain, one of Britain's best interviewers, brings her signature blend of curiosity and tenacity to weekly conversations with world leaders, business titans and cultural icons.
David Rubenstein explores the science of living longer by interviewing leading experts and examining the key barriers that still affect it: obesity, neurodegenerative diseases and cancer.
David Rubenstein explores the science of living longer by interviewing leading experts and examining the key barriers that still affect it: obesity, neurodegenerative diseases and cancer.
Ajay Banga on the Youth Jobs Time Bomb - Ajay Banga on growing up in India, rising through the private sector, and leading the World Bank as emerging markets brace for a youth jobs crisis.
Bloomberg Investigates takes viewers on an immersive journey to the heart of our most powerful reporting. Each investigation is recounted by award-winning journalists.
Exploring every angle of climate change, technology, finance, sports and beyond, Bloomberg Originals is business as you've never seen it.
Highlights of the event which brings together the most influential female voices in finance from around the world to discuss the biggest themes facing the future of business.

The Big Business of Drilling Deep Into the Earth - Geothermal has been the underdog of the energy industry - but that may be about to change as new startups use fracking technologies to expand potential geothermal sites.
Why Money Is Flowing Into Geoengineering - Scientists and entrepreneurs are testing radical ideas like solar radiation management and ocean fertilisation - and finding funding for it.
Pascal Desroches, AT&T - AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fiber and 5G wireless connectivity.
Monkey Laundering - How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

Gina Goetter, Hasbro - Gina Goetter is the CFO and COO of Hasbro. She's the architect of the company's transformation, diversifying its manufacturing footprint and investing in Hasbro's video game ambitions.
A recap of Bloomberg TV coverage of Davos 2026 featuring interviews with global leaders in business, finance and politics. Hosted by Francine Lacqua.
A monthly deep dive into Africa's biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africa's quest of bridging the gap with global powers.
